quote: It's Friday afternoon.

Why did the computer keep freezing? Because it left its Windows open!
Just in case your boss need proof that your computer is 'frozen': https://www.bluescreenofdeath.vercel.app

Fun fact: The Black Screen Of Death has caused 8 Million devices and 7 Billion people both pondering the meaning of life for the first time ever since the extinction of dinosaurs.
No, the code doesn't work on your machine. I'm turning it off before you get yourself fired.
I'm grounding y'all. No more flights until next week. Take your phone, call an Uber, go back home, and hug her.
Get off your a** and take a long walk. You stare too much.
Mom's not here, so I'm the captain now.
Get a life.
Did you notice there's dirt on the screen and the keyboard?

To all IT guys that are jointly responsible for this week's consumption of 90% of coffee in the universe: the world thanks you for your service.

Gods, when was the last time you took a bath? Uuhh...
One wrong line of code can shut the world down and cause real damage. Think about that before you make something for billions of people.

To resolve this BSOD, identify the error code, update your drivers, check for Windows updates, run a memory check, scan your PC for malware, inspect hard drive errors, and uninstall recent software. Should be easy, right?
